name: sandbox
description: Project for running API automated tests

scripts.api-test-automation-core: newman run MODULE-Sandbox.postman_collection.json -e Sandbox.postman_environment.json -d MODULE-Sandbox.Core.json --reporters cli,html,htmlextra --reporter-html-export index_core.html --reporter-htmlextra-logs --reporter-htmlextra-export Postman_API_Tests.html --reporter-htmlextra-title 'Sandbox module, Core tests' --reporter-htmlextra-titleSize 6 --reporter-htmlextra-darkTheme

author: APOSTOL
